text:
I hear the jury's still out on science.

I don't understand the question, and I won't respond to it.
Michael! Army had half a day. Get me a vodka rocks. And a piece of toast.
No! I was ashamed to be SEEN with you. I like being with you. He'll want to use your yacht, and I don't want this thing smelling like fish.
Now, when you do this without getting punched in the chest, you'll have more fun. But I bought a yearbook ad from you, doesn't that mean anything anymore?
